name: Lyrie Akenja

specials.name: Familiar
specials.description: Lyrie has a familiar, a cat named "Skivver"

specials.name: Counterspell
specials.description: Trigger A creature Casts a Spell Lyrie has prepared; Effect Lyrie expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. Lyrie loses its spell slot as if she had cast the triggering spell. Lyrie then attempts to counteract the triggering spell.

specials.name: Spellbook
specials.description: In addition to the spells she has prepared, Lyrie also has the following spells in the spellbook: 2nd: blur, darkvision, dispel magic 1st: charm, fear, color spray, illusory disguise, longstrider, magic weapon Cantrips: prestidigitation, read aura, message, ghost sound, produce flame

specials.name: Reach Spell
specials.description: If the next action the Lyrie uses is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, extend its range to 30 feet.

specials.name: Widen Spell
specials.description:
Lyrie manipulates the energy of her spell, causing it to affect a wider area. If the next action she uses is to Cast a Spell that has an area of a burst, cone, or line and does not have a duration, increase the area of that spell. 
* Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet (a burst with a smaller radius is not affected). 
* Add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that is normally 15 feet long or smaller, and add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line.

items: dagger, wand of mage armor, spellbook, darkvision elixir (moderate)
spells: shield, light, mage hand, electric arc, telekinetic projectile

strikes.name: dagger
strikes.traits: agile, finesse, thrown 10 ft., versatile S
